TopicTitle: If you were the first person on mars, what would you say?

Articles.Content:
"What do you mean my 'Land on Duna' contract wasn't completed? I mean, I went all the way to Mars fo- oh. Ohhhhh..."

Edited December 21, 2023 by TwoCalories
Contract Completed! "Land on New Page"
"That's one small- um- guys, why is the ground grey-" *looks up and sees Duna* "Um, I am proud to be the first kerbal on Ike, I guess. If anyone asks, this was definitely on purpose."
"Okay guys, we landed a little off course. Don't worry, we'll only have to walked roughly 2 kilometers to the MAV."

"Look! What a horrible hurricane at the horizon!"

P.S.
Btw, you can switch the vowels, and the sense doesn't change.

"horrible hurricane" = "hurrible horricane" (something horrible which makes you hurry up)
"So you know how we were supposed to land next to the HAB? Well, suppose one was a little off course... Look at it this way, we won't have to walk to get to it."
"What do you mean we forgot to pack the deployable science?!"
"Wait we were sent here to pick up rocks for 2 years?"
"Hey, guys! Remember how people were worried you would sink into lunar dust and it turned out it was no problem? I finally proved it can happen! On Mars, at least..."
"Houston, this is Divinity-5, updating you on the status of our stuck docking ports. Well, we managed to land, but..." *points camera toward the entire mothership lying on the surface*

"brrr skibidi dop dop dop yes yes skibidi dop dop yes yes"

or, my real answer.

"Wait, we're here? For real life?"

Edited December 23, 2023 by BA-Forums
edit was for spelling

"Hehe sKibiDi toiLEt hehe- wait, what do you mean 'Orbital strike initiated - Take cover immediately'?"

Edited December 23, 2023 by TwoCalories
"Ok, Ive seen it, can we go back now?"
"So, we have grabbed the Mars. How should we bring it to home?"

"Shift... CTRL... Shift... Shif- GAH! STICKY KEYS! NOOOOOOO NO NO NO NO CLOSE THAT THING NO NO NO NO NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!"

Edited December 24, 2023 by TwoCalories
"I told mission control we should have done a mission that's more then flags and footprints but no! We have to stay here for years doing absolutely nothing while waiting for a earth transfer window!"

"Uhh... looks like the rover-hab's wheels busted on landing. I told you guys at Mission Control to bring along an engineer instead of two scientists!"

Edited December 25, 2023 by TwoCalories
"Where am I?" "Last thing I knew I was drinking at a Bar in Shanghai."
"That's it? Just sand and some rocks? No, like, alien pyramids or something? What a bust."

Guess I'll have to find Pathfinder...

And don't forget to make sure the drill is unplugged
"I'm on Mars. Where are the Marsupials?"

"Watch out for Sand Worms."

Edited December 28, 2023 by ColdJ
"Wait, wasn't this just meant to be a Mars gravity assist? What happened?"
"Take a right turn and drive along for 140 million miles. Enter Mars' SOI. Continue..."
"Hey commander, is the 'Oxygen' alarm one of the important ones?"
I just need to spit my gum out somewhere.
